channel.title: Something to Drop on that First Grunt
channel.description:
When the first grunt is encountered, I see that there are controls connected to a very big cargo box over the grunt. I've tried activating them, but I can't make it drop on him.
Is it possible to make it drop on him, or was the implementation not considered by the mod team?

item.title: Something to Drop on that First Grunt
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
Disappointing to hear that… oh well, in before “Black Mesa: The Box” mod comes out

Read full topic
item.source: Something to Drop on that First Grunt

item.title: Something to Drop on that First Grunt
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
I’d totally go add that right now, but I don’t want to fix up what decompilation breaks.

Read full topic
item.source: Something to Drop on that First Grunt

item.title: Something to Drop on that First Grunt
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
When I first played that section, I tried pressing the green-glowing button, but nothing happened. It would be interesting if you could drop it on him.

Read full topic
item.source: Something to Drop on that First Grunt

item.title: Something to Drop on that First Grunt
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
The box is static, you can’t do anything with it. Interestingly enough though, one of the ropes seems to be parented to a non-existent “drop_crate.” I could just be silly, but that combined with the environment setup makes it seem like it was possible or considered at one time, but wasn’t implemented or got cut for whatever reason.

You can drop some lead on 'him, though. :freeman:

Read full topic
item.source: Something to Drop on that First Grunt
